title: Drummer Hoff (K)
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, William Snyder, Morton Schindel and Gene Deitch
brief_description: This film is a lively folk verse about the building of a cannon called the Sultan. Brightly dressed in full uniform, each soldier brings a part of the remarkable machine. Based on the book by Barbara and Ed Emberly.
creator_credit_for_label: Weston Woods Studios, William Snyder, Morton Schindel and Gene Deitch
